properties.title: Rimmel London

properties.description:
This company is a huge establishment that is a supplier several high end brands worldwide. Some of these brands include Playboy, Rimmel, Adidas, etc.

Coty brings in products from different suppliers who then brand the products and sell them.
properties.address: 2 Park Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
properties.title: Coty

properties.description: Another leading beauty supply company. The headquarters is located in France but it is distributed throughout North America as well.
properties.title: L'Oreal International

properties.description: Beauty Supply company. Similar to Oil of Olay or Cover Girl in North America but located in and around Asia.
properties.title: Shiseido Beauty Products

properties.description: Leading brand in beauty care. Their mascara brushes come from a manufacturing company in China.
properties.address: Procter & Gamble Plaza, Cincinnati, OH 45202, USA
properties.title: Oil of Olay

properties.description: This company produces mascara brushes for several companies including Oil of Olay, Shiseido, L'Oreal and Coty.
properties.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics

properties.description: A manufacturing/ chemical company specializing in pellet pressing. This company deals with many chemical properties and processes. They have a foot in many industries including food, recycling, biomass, petfood, chemical, plant etc.
properties.title: KAHL

properties.description:
Yet another company involed in the production of coatings, polymers and chemical prooducts need to produce mascara.

Upon further investigation it came apparent that BASF (another supplier of chemicals on this map) actually bought out Ciba in 2009. 

See this website for more information: http://www.icis.com/v2/companies/9145171/ciba-specialty-chemicals.html

There is also a video. Apologies for the shakiness and the heavy accent on the speaker... =)
properties.title: Ciba Specialty Chemicals

properties.description: Croda specializes in a number of products. The most relative including polymers, glues, coatings etc. All chemical properties used in the process of making mascara.
properties.address: Hall Close, Snaith, Goole, East Riding of Yorkshire DN14 9LF, UK
properties.title: Croda Inc.

properties.description:
Printing and Pigment company based out of the United States. Technologies in printing and colour in hundreds of industries.

See video for more information.
properties.title: Sun Chemical

properties.description:
Catalyst synthesis company
Chemistry based manufacturing
Dealing mainly with adsorbents and desiccants
properties.title: BASF Catalysts Germany

properties.description:
Importer
Exporter
Manufacturer

Complex Red Organic Pigment, Industrial Organic Pigments, Organic Pigments, Red Organic Pigment and Synthetic Organic Pigments.

properties.title: Degussa Canada Inc.

**Main Manufacturer & Supplier of Mascara**
Distributor
Manufacturer
Exporter

15 to 20 million in sales
properties.title: Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description: Supplies Mascara manufacturer with the organic pigments used in their products.
properties.title: Degussa Canada Inc. to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description:
BASF provides the main mascara manufacturing with the chemical properties that go into the actual mascara solution. 
This may be due to the lack of chemistry labs available at the main supplier factory or simply no need to produce already existing technologies/ solutions.
properties.title: BASF Catalysts Germany to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description: Provides already developed cosmetic technologies in regards to colour. Sun Chemical has significant colour technologies for cosmetics that have hues that change depending on the angle, intense colours in a variety of cosmetics, etc.
properties.title: Sun Chemical  to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description: Provides polymers, lubricants and coatings for the manufacturing of mascara.
properties.title: Croda International to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd
Ciba Specialty Chemicals to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description:
This company supplies the mascara manufacturer with anything from polymer additives to plant extracts.

A lot more goes into plant extracts than one would originally expect.
properties.title: KAHL to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

properties.description: Supply of mascara brushes to Oil of Olay, one of the leading brands in beauty care.

properties.description:
Dalian provides Mascara brushes to Coty who then combines this with other supplies from different manufacturers so they can supply the brand names with what they need.

(Cool right! I didn't even know things like this existed!)
properties.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics to Coty

properties.description: This is one example of how the supply of several brands gets the product to the actual brand company.
